sets.set_reasoning: The Overhead Cable Triceps Extension is chosen for its effectiveness in targeting the long head of the triceps, which is crucial for achieving the user's goal of thicker triceps. The volume of 3 sets aligns with the beginner's guideline of 3-6 sets per muscle group per session, ensuring adequate stimulus for growth.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows you to complete 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a resistance band that provides similar tension to the cable setup, ensuring you can complete 10-12 reps.

sets.set_reasoning: Skull Crushers are included to further target the long head of the triceps, providing a different angle of stretch and contraction. This exercise complements the overhead extension, ensuring comprehensive development of the triceps.

exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select dumbbells that allow you to perform 10-12 reps with good form, focusing on the stretch and contraction of the triceps.

sets.set_reasoning: Bar Press Down is included to target the medial and lateral heads of the triceps, providing a balanced approach to triceps development. This exercise is stable and easy to overload, making it suitable for beginners.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a resistance band that provides similar tension to the cable setup, ensuring you can complete 10-12 reps.

workout_explanation: This workout session is structured to maximize triceps growth within a 30-minute timeframe, focusing on exercises that target different parts of the triceps. The Overhead Cable Triceps Extension and Skull Crushers emphasize the long head, which is crucial for achieving the user's goal of thicker triceps. The Bar Press Down complements these by targeting the medial and lateral heads. The volume and rest periods are designed to fit within the user's beginner level and time constraints, ensuring effective and efficient training.
